lead_paragraph: The Iraqi government has called on Turkey to pull out all of its troops, saying it never invited their participation in an international effort to train forces to fight the Islamic State.

headline.main: Turkey to Continue Withdrawal of Troops From Northern Iraq

snippet: The Iraqi government has called on Turkey to pull out all of its troops, saying it never invited their participation in an international effort to train forces to fight the Islamic State.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
